title: lsi
description: Runs Latent Semantic Indexing. Computes cell embeddings, feature loadings and singular values. Uses the implementation of scipy.

Dataset input.title: Dataset input
Dataset input.description: Dataset input using nf-tower "dataset" or "data explorer". Allows for the input of multiple         parameter sets to initialise a Nextflow channel.

param_list.description: Dataset input can either be a list of maps, a csv file, a json file, a yaml file, or simply a yaml                 blob. The names of the input fields (e.g. csv columns, json keys) need to be an exact match with the workflow input parameters.

input.description: Type: `file`, required, example: `input.h5mu`. Path to input h5mu file
input.help_text: Type: `file`, required, example: `input.h5mu`. Path to input h5mu file

modality.description: Type: `string`, default: `atac`. On which modality to run LSI on
modality.help_text: Type: `string`, default: `atac`. On which modality to run LSI on.

layer.description: Type: `string`. Use specified layer for expression values
layer.help_text: Type: `string`. Use specified layer for expression values. If not specified, uses adata.X.

var_input.help_text: Type: `string`. Column name in .var matrix that will be used to select which genes to run the LSI on. If not specified, uses all features.

output.description: Type: `file`, required, default: `$id.$key.output.h5mu`, example: `output.h5mu`. Output h5mu file
output.help_text: Type: `file`, required, default: `$id.$key.output.h5mu`, example: `output.h5mu`. Output h5mu file.

output_compression.description: Type: `string`, default: `gzip`, choices: ``gzip`, `lzf``. The compression format to be used on the output h5mu object
output_compression.help_text: Type: `string`, default: `gzip`, choices: ``gzip`, `lzf``. The compression format to be used on the output h5mu object.

obsm_output.help_text: Type: `string`, default: `X_lsi`. In which .obsm slot to store the resulting embedding.

varm_output.help_text: Type: `string`, default: `lsi`. In which .varm slot to store the resulting loadings matrix.

uns_output.help_text: Type: `string`, default: `lsi`. In which .uns slot to store the stdev.

overwrite.help_text: Type: `boolean_true`, default: `false`. Allow overwriting .obsm, .varm and .uns slots.

num_components.description: Type: `integer`, default: `50`. Number of components to compute
num_components.help_text: Type: `integer`, default: `50`. Number of components to compute.

scale_embeddings.description: Type: `boolean`, default: `true`. Scale embeddings to zero mean and unit variance
scale_embeddings.help_text: Type: `boolean`, default: `true`. Scale embeddings to zero mean and unit variance.

nextflow input-output arguments.title: Nextflow input-output arguments
nextflow input-output arguments.description: Input/output parameters for Nextflow itself. Please note that both publishDir and publish_dir are supported but at least one has to be configured.

publish_dir.description: Type: `string`, required, example: `output/`. Path to an output directory
publish_dir.help_text: Type: `string`, required, example: `output/`. Path to an output directory.
